## hexCoordinateKey() function

Generate a unique string for a hex coordinate. This function will always generate the same string for a given coordinate.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function hexCoordinateKey(coordinate: HexCoordinate): string;
```

</th><th>

</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

coordinate


</td><td>

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)


</td><td>

The hex coordinate.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

string

A string unique to the coordinate.
